description: Have you ever wanted to know how the electrons are arranged in an atom of a given element?  Orbitals will tell you the electron configuration of any atom by telling you the names of the orbitals along with how many electrons are in each one.  Orbitals will even tell you when an element's electron configuration is different from the one predicted by the Madelung rule!  If you need the total number of electrons (or protons), just ask for the atomic number.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Atomic orbitals What's the electron configuration of chromium?
Alexa, ask Atomic orbitals How many protons are in the nucleus of gold?
Alexa, ask Atomic orbitals Tell me how the electrons are arranged in platinum
name: Orbitals
shortDescription: Orbitals is all about atoms & how their electrons are arranged.  With this skill, Alexa can tell you the atomic number & electron configuration of any element.
